climbs.name: Woody's Whirlpool Bath
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tim Pinar, Brett Pinar

content.description: This is a tough pumpy overhung jug war. Not to mention I'm pretty sure the cave area to the right is home to a carniverous beast (see pics).
content.location: This route is dead center of the formation on the NW face. It starts out of the huge hueco in the center. If you want to top rope this it is possible to get to the rap rings by lowering or rapping in from the anchors on Meth Mart. Or climb Meth Mart and traverse right to the rings.

climbs.name: My Naughty Little Donkey
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Will Strickland, Kelby Burnham

content.description: This climb starts on a slabby stance with a high first bolt. The start is the hard part with an akward crack in the beginning. After that it moves up to the flake and over a lip to the top.
content.location: Just to the right of Weiner inspector you will see this line of bolts up the right side of a big flake.

climbs.name: Meth Mart
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Brett Pinar, Resa Ashbachar

content.description: The crux of this fun climb is a little height dependant. Make sure you save some energy for the top.
content.protection: Start out in a crack with small gear mostly nuts. There are 2 bolts that protect the crux. Shares an anchor with My Naughty Little Donkey.
content.location: Center of the formation on the NW face you will find this route just to the left of the obvious hueco.

climbs.name: Weiner Inspector
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Will Strickland, Kelby Burnham

content.description: Interesting steep start to finish on the face on top.
content.location: This route is on far left of the NW face of the formation. It starts with two bolts down low and moves up and over to the two bolts on the face.

climbs.name: Bongo Johnnie
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tim Pinar, Brett Pinar

content.description: This route is to the right the ugly cave area on the face.
content.location: NW face of the formation to the right of Woody's Whirlpool Bath.
